mapper.select: SELECT id,shop_no shopNo,shop_area shopArea,house_id houseId FROM ht_shop WHERE house_id=#{houseId} AND is_del=0

SELECT p.id,p.shop_no shopNo,p.shop_area shopArea,h.`owner` shopName,h.address,h.sale,h.water_type_id waterTypeId, h.electic_type_id electicTypeId,h.rubbish_type_id rubbishTypeId,h.property_type_id propertyTypeId, h.due_time dueTime,h.remark_name remarkName FROM ht_shop p LEFT JOIN ht_house h ON p.house_id=h.id
